Name: Requiring borough presidents to establish and maintain an office to assist community boards by providing legal, information technology, community planning, and human resources support.
Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to requiring borough presidents to establish and maintain an office to assist community boards by providing legal, information technology, community planning, and human resources support
BodyName: Committee on Governmental Operations, State & Federal Legislation

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
